ygData.subject: Malachite in Qeynos? NO MORE?!?!
ygData.msgSnippet: After patching and logging into Fennin Ro, I proceeded to visit the Herb Shop near the Magic Guild (ie Orgy of Magic Casting Flooding Your Chat Box) to pick up
ygData.messageBody:
After patching and logging into Fennin Ro, I proceeded to visit the Herb
Shop near the Magic Guild (ie Orgy of Magic Casting Flooding Your Chat
Box) to pick up some Malachite for my summoning my fiery buddy. Imagine
my surprise when he had none! I shouted (which I usually do not do)
saying why the was no more Malachite and where I could get some. Someone
metioned I could visit Erudin for the Green Goodness. I went to Erudin
(when I could have been going to SplitPaw) and found out they cost 2 more
silver than they were in Qeynos! (7 silver). Now I see this lack of a
basic component in a human city as a discouragment to all magicians who
start out here. Does anybody agree or is there some news I didn't not yet
hear about?

Thanks
Kapolokok


*********************************************************************
"Rumpletweezer ran the Dinky Tinky shop in the foot of the
Magic oak tree by the wobbly dum dum tree in the shade of
the magic glade down in Dingly Dell. Here he sold contraceptives..."
-- Python
